website_summaries.verdict: Pleasing price point for a nice beginner set of sockets. Good build quality, considering what you pay.
pros: Chrome vanadium steel sockets will last for many uses
Precise size construction on the bits
Nice carrying case will keep the sockets well organized
Lower price than many other sets, while still nice quality
Handy starter set for people who only occasionally need sockets
cons: Not a set for users needing precise quality, as some common larger sizes of sockets are not included

customer_reviews.title: After owning these for more than three years I recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these in March 2016. I am writing this review in January 2020. This set has came in handy so many times over the years I can’t even count. That being said I am not sure how much I can trust the quality so I do not use it for applications where I will really be stressing these sockets. I have not broken any and they have not damaged any fasteners. I would definitely recommend this for light duty use. I probably would not use this with any sort of impact tool.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great tools, subpar case
customer_reviews.text: These tools feel and look like high quality tools. They look a lot like Craftsman tools and seem like higher quality. Five stars for the tools themselves! The reason for only four stars is the case. The tools fit well and do not rattle around much. The hinges are thin plastic and don’t feel like they will last long. Also, it comes with a very small price of foam to hold the tools in place and this will get easy lost/damaged or just desintigrate over time. Great tools just expect to put them in a tool box and not keep the provided case for long.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Id

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for my needs..
customer_reviews.text: This is my forth Neiko tools purchase and just like the others I am very satisfied with it. Anytime I need a specialty or seldom used tool (usually to work on a family members VW) this is my go to brand and I have yet to be disappointed. Sets of this type tend to be pretty pricey but as usual this company comes through with a reasonable option. To date I have only put the larger sizes to use but the set appears to have the quality to last for some time...
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Can't go without
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this set. I'm an electrician, and doing any work on big service equipment, there are a lot of hex drive lugs. This speeds things WAY up. Get the attachments to slap these on an impact driver and it can save you so much time. I also even prefer having these on a nice ratcheting handle, instead of the classic T-handle Allen keys. I love everything about these, and wont go without a set. Only downside is if your fastener is in a tight squeeze, the socket may be too big to fit. Buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good machining
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly what I was hoping for based on the description. These are solid bits, with good, precision machining and champhered edges so they fit securely without damaging fasteners. I just got these and have used the 14mm on a high torque application, all the way to 3mm and they have performed perfectly. The PE-HD case is perfect. I'll certainly consider this brand in the future based on this awesome quality set.
customer_reviews.author: bfricka

customer_reviews.title: Great for the home mechanic
customer_reviews.text: I have had this set for a couple of years. The quality is good. I have learned with tools to look at the quality provided over the name on the box. Pulled them out today to change the brakes on my oldest child's VW Jetta. Worked like a charm. I have bought several sets of Neiko tools and wouldn't hesitate to buy them again. Your mileage may differ, but these are the right quality for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Yamaha Rider

customer_reviews.title: A must have for you box
customer_reviews.text: I have had this same set for a year and a half now. Any Allen head can be broken with enough force especially the smaller ones. I however have not broken any from this set. I usually use them on an impact. I've done frame bolts with this set. No issues. For the money they can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Well made product, good selection of bits, for low cost.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product, and highly useable for a garage mechanic. Wide selection of inserts, for a fairly low cost. We needed something like this desperately, but could not afford snap-on pricing, nor buying this selection on an individual basis. Not sure about durability, since we've only put a few hours of use on some bits, but they seem pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: esdguru08

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am sure ( trust me!) That you could spend more money to get a similiar set, but you would be wasting money! The set is comprehensive, well built, and comes in a very handy tool box! All in all an excellent value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Haight

customer_reviews.title: A must need for the tool box
customer_reviews.text: Probably not impact rated but I took that in mind when I purchased this. Ive used these sockets with my dewalt impact and they have performed well. This a great set with a full range of sizes for industrial use. The only issue is I wished they were one consistent drive size; 1/2, 3/8 would have been ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCarty

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used about 6 of these. One of my small ones snapped the first time I used it. I wasn’t using any power at all, just snapped off. 1/4 inch small on. If you plan to use them lightly for the small stuff I’d get a better set. Now the larger size ones I used with a impact flawlessly so far.
customer_reviews.author: samul solis

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Has almost every bit I'd need. I gotta get some bigger ones, but for the price, these are some primo strong bits that have held up to my electric impacts and breaker bars in tight spaces. Only gripe is the case which I give the 4-stars for. Nice hard shell indeed, but don't bump it or you'll be in for a shower of bits all over the floor, because the recesses are minimal
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: good so far
customer_reviews.text: Broke 5/16" bit on low torque hand tool ratchet. You may think, just replace it. If I'm on a job and a tool breaks, I'm losing more money than just for the tool. Sk is the next set for me, they are fairly cheaper than snap on but seem to have rust issues. No one can say they have weak steel though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my daily job as a heavy equipment mechanic. The product arrived on time and undamaged. They are well built and heavy duty. I would reccommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: Blane O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of hex bit sockets, the chrome finish is heavy and the bit bites into the hex head to prevent rounding. Blow molded case was a great bonus and addition to my growing tool collection. Never had a problem with any Neiko products and look forward to using more of their tools in the future.
customer_reviews.author: C944

customer_reviews.title: Smaller sizes bust
customer_reviews.text: I have used this set very few times. I see rust from use on three of the larger bits. But there are now two bits I’ve snapped the 2mm and 3/32. Both while using the correct 1/4 drive ratchet. Today when the 3/32 snapped I wasn’t even putting much torque on it. If it’s the only tool that will work and you have to get it done don’t depend on this set.
customer_reviews.author: Snakefarm

customer_reviews.title: Great back up set/ very handy to have around
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a back up set for work and for the 1/2 drive socket sizes Holding up great so far only issue I am having is that I had 2 of 1 size so in turn missing one but the missing size is one I have never used and the size that is in its place I use alot so it works for me will still buy again
customer_reviews.author: Joshua N.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: These work well for the price. Not sure what holds these in but one of the heads came out of the socket. We put some JB Weld around the head and stuck it back in the socket and let it cure, never had a issue with it again. Just FYI if yours falls out.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: Check contents Mine had two 9/32 sockets next to each other in the box. Didn't notice until after the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: The sockets are nicely finished and well made
customer_reviews.text: I always was looking around for the right size Allen wrench because they were scattered around the drawer. Now everything is in one spot, so the frustration level is definitely lower. The sockets are nicely finished and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Aradcom

customer_reviews.title: For my job I use the 3mm a lot, ...
customer_reviews.text: For my job I use the 3mm a lot, at least once a week. Sometimes there's high torque too. I was trying to install a screw if a hole that wasn't lining up very well and it had started threading when the bit snapped. I wasn't putting too much torque on it either. I had also been having trouble with getting the bit into the head, but that might just have been a problem with the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Sean H.

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the money and does what its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Every size you need up to .750. Great for assembly and disasembly. The hex bits fit firmly and snugly into fasteners minamizing slippage and stripped out fastener heads. I have not tried these on corroded or rusted bolts yet but as for newish bolts/Fasteners they work great with a ratchet. The case is blow molded and compact for easy storage in the toolbox. The ony down side to the case is that the Sockets do not snap in the case. Overall 5 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Rustyhands soretools

customer_reviews.title: NIce complete set
customer_reviews.text: Well made with a nice case, not sure how well they'll resist rust since I keep them inside, but they seem to be on par with the standards of any of the other tools on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: High quality finish
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on Amazon reviews, and the selection of sizes included. All items are clearly marked, and are of exceptional finish. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bits and packaging. Had one of the smaller quarter inch drive bits that came looking slightly damaged but for this price who cares! I'm a professional diesel tech and use these on a daily basis and these things will take some abuse. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: surprising quality for the price... only broke ...
customer_reviews.text: surprising quality for the price... only broke one so far, i just wish the 3/8" drive part started at the 1/4" size (the one i broke) instead of 9/32" and that the 1/2" drive part of the set stared at 1/2", instead of 5/8". i broke TWO 3/8" drive extensions so far torquing a 5/8"-11 bolt which need a 1/2" Allen wrench...
customer_reviews.author: matthew plungis

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit to cover all the bases. I’m a heavy equipment technician and use this kit constantly. Hard to beat the price and range of the kit. These are perfect for someone just starting out and who doesn’t want to buy tool truck right away. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: mike goodwin

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I like these bit sockets quite well. ive used them twice now and they are perfect for the job. would buy these again. strongly recommend them to others
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Okay, look, short and sweet here. Not the cheapest, but the machining by this company is awesome. Fits in every bolthead I've stuck it up against, and fits great, no lash in the socket... yeah, spend the extra $$$ and buy from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Super nice Hex bits!
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with these when I opened the case! They look nice and are built super nice also. Granted at this writing I haven't put a breaker bar to them yet so maybe by the end of this next summer I will need to revamp my review, but out of the box I'm very impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D

customer_reviews.title: Much better quality than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: A co-worked bought a very similar set from the tool truck for about 8 times more money. I bought this one instead. Both of our sets get used several times a day. He's already broken two sockets whereas all of mine still work like new. Yes he gets free replacements (once the tool truck comes around and orders it for him) but in the mean time he's stuck borrowing mine! Granted he's a lot harder on his tools than I am but I have no complaints whatsoever purchasing this set!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Pool

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a damn good price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. Bits look well made and are clean (not covered in manufacturing oils). Price point is damn good. Look forward to giving them a test drive...no pun intended...
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Knuckle saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for any atv owner. I can get so much more torque on stubborn bolts. If you keep breaking allenwrenches like I do just buy this set and save your knuckles.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Quality tools at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few chances to use these lately and I'm very pleased with the quality. I have a Neiko torx set so I kinda already knew what to expect. They're solid, fit into allen head bolts snugly and I really like the case. I don't know why I didn't buy a set of these years ago. No more darn Allen head keys for me!
customer_reviews.author: OpenTrackRacer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, great price
customer_reviews.text: 99.9% sure I will never need any of the larger sizes, but for the same price I would have paid for a pair of 7pc metric/SAE sets from a local store, its nice to have them all just in case. Nice little case too.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bonds

customer_reviews.title: NICE SET!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set to change the rotors on my car. The sockets fit snugly on my ratchet and held up nicely to the torque needed to break free the bolts. The plastic case is fairly well made and should hold up for some time.
customer_reviews.author: hillbilly bob

customer_reviews.title: So worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the standard hex keys for years and years and have always wanted the socket style but never wanted to spend tool truck prices for a whole kit. Metric and standard in one kit without skipping sizes at a affordable rate.
customer_reviews.author: This guy

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not bad at all.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very hesitant as to whether or not I should purchase these because I have never heard of the brand before. I have use most of them now for various reasons. Having the larger hex bits was very handy in fixing a hose that blew out. Thus far they have been dependable and not broken.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: I'm just mad that I've been using the old allen wrench keys for so long. So many projects would have gone easier, had I bought this set sooner. Works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOOLS
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have what I needed to work on the brakes on my 81 C10 so I bought these. They work good and have not had an issue with
customer_reviews.author: jessica holtzen

customer_reviews.title: Missing 11mm
customer_reviews.text: For the money, these are great. I’m a mechanic and use them everyday. My only problem is that it doesn’t include a 11mm. Dodge Durango’s/ Jeep Cherokees front calipers bolts are 11mm. Other then that, this kit has every size you’ll need until you get into the really big stuff. Have yet to break any although I have broken 2 of the torx bits I’m the other set they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light duty, nice but not impact rated.
customer_reviews.text: Just got these, they are fine for lighter use, but don't use in impact situation, they were out of impact versions on Amazon so I got these. Rounded off the 1/2 with my impact wrench. MY FAULT, these are not impact rated, thought they would be a little more robust. Nice case and good selection of sizes. Shiny.At least got my job completed before the 1/2 was trashed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nagy

customer_reviews.title: You're not as cool as me, because you still have those stupid keyring alan wrenches lol
customer_reviews.text: Loving this set. High quality and VERY useful. You can also use a handheld socket screwdriver. Also bought this item with the "Titan 12082 Socket Adapter Set - 3 Piece" in BLACK. Can't tell you how happy I am to finally not be using those stupid keyring sets. I hate those, they're so uncomfortable and useless for most tasks. I already used it and showed it off. I told my friend he's not as cool as me because he doesn't have this set. hahahaha
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Got this set since the Allen sets I had skipped sizes. I purchased this set to remove the caliper slide pins on my car and I didn’t have the sizes I needed. I like sets and liked that this set included both SAE and Metric in one case.
customer_reviews.author: John J Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Neiko master hex bit set
customer_reviews.text: So far they hold up to everyday use. Havent stripped anything and they grab very well.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: They work. Solid set
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I expected. They work and now I have a lot more sizes than I’ll probably ever need. Solid.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Weak metal.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and arrived 2 days ago. Already broke one. Putting lock-on grips on an atv. Hardly any torque.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little set for the rare times I need these little jewels. Example: the front differential drain plug on my ATV. It needs an allen wrench but its a pain to get the leverage on it with the little allen wrench and using some kinda make-shift cheater to apply enough torque to break the plug free. Now i can use my socket wrench, extension, & knuckle joint if needed. These aren't something a person will use alot. But in certain circumstances they are a huge help.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: BANG FOR THE BUCK
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed on the quality and fitment of the sockets. Great case and easy to carry. Not to mention the PRICE!!!! This is a great metric set.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Baeza

customer_reviews.title: Good construction
customer_reviews.text: Great hex set for the price. Construction seems solid and should last
customer_reviews.author: scott rainone

customer_reviews.title: Works for light duty
customer_reviews.text: For a cheap set of alen sockets these work great. If you are looking for a high strength tool to take tons of torque and heavy use go for mac or snap on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage, not super durable
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage. These are obviously a little cheap and break a little easy, but that fits the price
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: We had a stuck hex head bolt, my co-workers workers snapon socket broke, but these held up and was able to remove the bolt. Seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool
customer_reviews.text: Glad i found these. They save a lot time. They do get stuck in the bolts on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: hermit guy

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the nicest and most complete Allen driver set I have seen. I work on industrial machinery, and I have had several different brands to date, this one tops them all. I recently used the 3/8" driver to remove a very stubborn cameroller, required cheater on the end of my breaker bar, the driver didn't even twist like some of my old ones have done under the same circumstances. Highly recommend this set to any professional..
customer_reviews.author: smackey02

customer_reviews.title: Great set of sockets
customer_reviews.text: Aaah those tools you use occasionally and can get really stuck on repair jobs when you really need them, they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Olukunle

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice having all the sizes right there in a blow molded case. I'm sure the case will suffer the usual hinge failure over time, but the sockets themselves seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: DANA M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the home mechanic.
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described. i have used these tools several times and they have been great so far. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: BigRay74

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made set had a great price and I would highly recommend purchasing one.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great value strong and nice organize case
customer_reviews.text: Great value very strong I use them a lot with air tools and haven’t broke one yet
customer_reviews.author: Jon Mccracken

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Only time will tell if it holds up, doesn't rust, or etc.
customer_reviews.author: skypuppy

customer_reviews.title: but they look like they are well built
customer_reviews.text: I only used couple of them so far, but they look like they are well built. The box and packing they come in also looks professional. Removed a star since nothing shows the country of origin.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love them the 4mm broke but had let someone borrow it his solution to most things is bigger hammer so i dont blame the socket
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very well, have used a 1/2” breaker bar with the larger sizes and hold up well, none have broke yet!
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality set of hex bits. I also have a set of Neiko torx bits. They're good too.
customer_reviews.author: JohnAndrews

customer_reviews.title: Needed this to perform some service on my Jeep. ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to perform some service on my Jeep. Everything fit and worked perfectly. I would buy a second set if I ever needed it or wanted to gift it to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for. They do the job. Not the best feel or quality.
customer_reviews.author: edward

customer_reviews.title: Strong Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use on 2012 A4 front hub center bolt - These are on tight, used large breaker bar and lots of pressure...Bit help up with no issues
customer_reviews.author: T Alan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Fits all the torex and Allen key sizes to do a break job.
customer_reviews.author: Ronathon

customer_reviews.title: Nice little kit to have around
customer_reviews.text: Have only used a couple times, bits seem to be strong. Nice little kit to have around.d
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Tired of allen wreches being hard to read the size or just dont have the size on it. Great set, wish it had the 13 and 16mm to make it complete.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Can't be beat for the price. Good case, nice selection, tools fit fasteners properly without too much play in the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: So glad your guys made this I had to fix my shower, it fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Quality metal and comprehensive sizing options!
customer_reviews.text: These hex sockets are built tough and made of quality metal. The comprehensive set allows for a perfect fit regardless of the size. I'm happy to have this product sitting in my toolbox. I'll never worry about improper fits or stripping hex bolts again.....Jay (Wilmington, NC)
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set of sockets
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of sockets. It's rare to find a large set like this without having to pay an obscene amount for them. Initial quality is great, only time will tell how well they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Sean stowers

customer_reviews.title: Just started buying tools for myself instead of bumming off ...
customer_reviews.text: Just started buying tools for myself instead of bumming off friends all the time. Thought they would not last long because of the price (I've seen cheap ones break) but damn these are some high quality and can handle some major torque.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kim

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use the smaller ones for industrial use.
customer_reviews.text: Used one and it broke! The metal isn’t as strong as your proto brand. Or whia.
customer_reviews.author: Frank varian

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: On the positive side, the set is complete and conveniently packaged. However, I use it lightly, and the first time I used the 6mm bit it snapped in two- using a 1/4 inch drive handle with limited pressure. Very disappointing. I have never had another tool break like that.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: High quality product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved me so much time putting stuff together. put the alan or torqx head on a drill and save so much time over standard alan wrenches. High quality product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality for the price! Heads hold tight, good precision fit, fit and finish seem to be on par with American equivalents.
customer_reviews.author: GoRogue84

customer_reviews.title: Works well, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and have had no problems after assembling an inversion table and other similar items. Would be perfect if the set included a socket wrench so everything could be in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Benny Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These make my job a lot easier at work. Don't need all of them, but nice to have just in case I need them.
customer_reviews.author: bill69m

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and nice to have most of the sizes together.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, I've only used the 15MM on a Cat oil drain plug and 17MM on a 2.8 Cummins remote oil filter connection.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: might not be craftsman or snap on but love these,they work great and i end up using these more than the craftsman and snap on set i have
customer_reviews.author: Flyin94

customer_reviews.title: Complete set at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete set. The case is sturdy. Very good price for the set. Quality seems to be very good. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Canyon

customer_reviews.title: Good tools excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good set of hex sockets and at a very reasonable price. I am a diesel mechanic and I will get a lot of use out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kanaheik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent finish
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a set in just 1/4" drive but decided to keep this since it has so many pieces
customer_reviews.author: BS Walker

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my son-in-law and he loved them! Durable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift for my son-law, he was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Phylcote

customer_reviews.title: These are a great deal
customer_reviews.text: So far a great kit with more sizes than I will likely need the 19 has survived 300 ft pounds
customer_reviews.author: Some guy

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: For the money it's the best master set you can buy. It can perform in a shop for a fraction of the price off the truck. Worth buying then replacing with tools off the truck if used enough to break
customer_reviews.author: garrett

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the product daily since December. Standing up well. It's a bit difficult to get the wrenches out of the box so I ditched that part.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace in Santa Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Well made set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set at a great price, it’s well made and comparable to my MAC and SNAPON sets., I keep this set in my company truck.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Babila

customer_reviews.title: Handy. Mid quality. Not highest not lowest
customer_reviews.text: Good to have so ya dont get caught wit your pant s down in a situaiton

customer_reviews.title: Cheesy case.
customer_reviews.text: Cheesy case. Have not used hex bits yet but the quality of the master torx bit set seems durable and worth the money so I would expect quality to be the same from same company
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Allen head sockets
customer_reviews.text: They came in pretty handy for what I needed. I definitely must buy
customer_reviews.author: Billy Austin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works, haven't broke or twisted one yet, use them in cordless impact guns
customer_reviews.author: christoph s

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for factory mechanics.
customer_reviews.text: As long as used appropriately these should last a long time. I always "break" bolts loose with an Allen wrench and then use these on my cordless impact and they work great. I do baby them because they are not impact rated but I have not broke one yet. It is they most complete set I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: No problems yet, works great and it looks nice in case
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Set is great and generally held up fantastically for the two years I've been using them. Only issue I've had is breaking the 4mm, and I can't find anywhere to message the manufacturer to get a replacement. Other than that this set has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Strong and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Best tools, I use them a lot in light and heavy-duty machines in the mines
customer_reviews.author: Mutukana

product_meta.title: Neiko 10288A Master Hex Bit Socket Set, 32 Piece | S2 Steel Machined Bits | Standard SAE and Metric Sized Sockets | 1/4", 3/8", & 1/2" Drives
product_meta.description: Style:Standard: Premium S2 steel bits provide optimal strength and durability to unfasten intractable screws and bit ends are sized for precise fitting. Sockets are made of enduring chrome-vanadium. Set includes: 16-pc. Sae hex bit sockets: 5/64, 3/32, 1/8, 5/32, 3/16, 7/32, 1/4, 9/32, 5/16, 3/8, 7/16, 1/2, 9/16, 5/8, 11/16, 3/4 in.; 16-pc. Metric hex bit sockets: 2mm, 2.5mm, 3mm, 4mm, 5mm, 5.5mm, 6mm, 7mm, 8mm, 9mm 10mm, 12mm, 14mm, 15mm, 17mm, 19mm. Storage and carrying case included.
feature_bullets: Hex key bits are made from premium S2 alloy steel for superior hardness that reduces wear outs and ensures maximum durability
High strength chrome vanadium steel sockets provide superior torque for greater turning power paired with a mirror chrome finish that provides resistance against rust, grime, and corrosion
Allen hex bit tips are precisely machined to ensure accurate sizing with beveled, chamfered ends for easy and smooth insertion that protects both bits and fasteners from damaged edges
Replaces multiple allen wrench sets and highly versatile for fastener application on bikes, tractors, and foreign European vehicle repairs
Compatible usage with hand wrenches and ratchet handles; Comes enclosed in blow mold case for easy identification and storage
